main event: An unidentified object struck the roof of a trailer house in Marshalltown, Iowa, on June 3, 1958.
interesting points: The object struck with a loud report similar to a rifle shot., It was reported to have many fragments, with one being the largest piece identified., Residents thought it might be a meteor after hearing a radio broadcast about a similar incident., The object was investigated by the USAF's 4715th Ground Observer Squadron., The object was found to be non-radioactive when checked.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. who lived in the trailer house where the object struck
